name: Large Purple Deluxe Double Orchid Anywhere Clip
description:
A beautiful Deluxe quality Large Hair / Anywhere Clip.  Looks stunning for Proms, weddings or just to finish off a vintage look.  Can be worn in the hair, or clipped on to a dress, or to pin up a skirt to show the petticoat underneath. It has a large stainless steel clip, which is very strong, and is hidden by the flowers and leaves.

Available in Purple (as shown) OR Purple & White Variegated.


Also available attached to a Satin covered headband (Very good quality)  (No Clip if attached to headband)

Headband colours - Black, Burgundy, Ivory.

PLEASE EMAIL YOUR PREFERENCE ONCE ORDERED, ANY QUESTIONS JUST MAIL ME!

Mail me if you would like to see other colour, and il send you a photo!

kittyboutique@hotmail.com

Delivery -  Free postage for first item!!!!!! Add £1 postage for subsequent items!!!!

Visit us on Facebook - search Kitty Boutique hair flowers x

name: Beautiful Deep Red Double Orchid Hair / Anywhere Clip
description:
A beautiful Large double orchid Hair / anywhere clip.  These clips are slightly smaller than the Deluxe purple clips, but still just as stunning.  As with all my clips they can be worn in the hair, or on clothing.  The stainless steel clip is large and strong, so it wont slide out of your hair!

Available in deep red (as shown) OR light cream.

Also available on a gorgeous satin headband.  Headbands are very comfortable, can be worn all day with no headache!

Headband colours Black, Burgundy, Ivory.

PLEASE EMAIL ME HEADBAND COLOUR PREFERENCE ONCE ORDERED.

Mail me if you would like to see other colour and il send you a photo!

description:

It is mounted on a medium size strong stainless steel clip.

Available in Rose Red (as shown), Deep red, Baby pink, white and Pale Yellow.

name: Luscious Pink Lily Single Anywhere Clip
description:
This Luscious dramatic Lily Clip, is very bright and head turning!  Its a single lily on a quality stainless steel clip.  Looks fantastic with circle dresses, or just a little black dress.  As with all my clips, can be worn in the hair or on your clothing.

name: Large Fushia Peony Anywhere Clip
description:
A stunning fuchsia peony, fading to yellow in the centre, measuring approx 12cm across, sits flat beautifully to the head or clothing.  It is attatched to a large stainless steel clip, to keep securely in place.

Postage to the Uk is free on this item, multiple items bought, will only cost £1 extra per item shipped!
